text: right Gundars Bērziņš (born 26 September 1959www.cvk.lv) is a Latvian accountant and politician and a Deputy of the Saeima since 1993. He is a member of the People's Party. He served as the Minister of Finance of Latvia from 2000 to 2002. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:People from Jēkabpils Municipality Category:Latvian Farmers' Union politicians Category:People's Party (Latvia) politicians Category:Ministers of Finance of Latvia Category:Ministers of Health of Latvia Category:Deputies of the 5th Saeima Category:Deputies of the 7th Saeima Category:Deputies of the 8th Saeima Category:Deputies of the 9th Saeima
title: Gundars Bērziņš
